comments.content:
Looks really... impressive! Never seen before, here...

comments.author: Manggy
comments.content:
I couldn't possibly get freaked out by a rambutan (it's everywhere in the Philippines!), but the floral taste of lychees/ rambutans/ longans does not sit well with me :/

Okay, maybe I'd freak out a little, but not in the horse's head in your bed kind of way :)

comments.author: pumpkinpie
comments.content: Mmm, rambutans are so delicious and not perfumy like longans or lychees.  As for finding one in my bed, one word for you: starts with "T" and rhymes with popsicle...

comments.author: Min Min
comments.content: A common fruit here in Malaysia. It's seasonal, only available in certain months of the year
